title: The U.S. Wants Out Of A Global Effort To Stop A Global Pandemic
description: The U.S. doesn't want to participate in a global effort to find and distribute a vaccine for COVID-19. Anna talks with FiveThirtyEight senior science writer Maggie Koerth about what that decision might mean for the country and the world.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, Anna Rothschild
itunes:summary: The U.S. doesn't want to participate in a global effort to find and distribute a vaccine for COVID-19. Anna talks with FiveThirtyEight senior science writer Maggie Koerth about what that decision might mean for the country and the world.
